%%pyspark
from pyspark.sql.functions import concat

uri= f'abfss://dls@dlsmdw778t05dev.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/southridge/cloudstreaming/{year}/{month}/{day}/Transactions-*.csv'
df_streaming = spark.read.load(uri, format='csv', sep=';', header=True)

from pyspark.sql.functions import lit, concat, to_timestamp
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("SourceID",lit(1))
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("UniqueOrderID", concat(df_streaming.SourceID, df_streaming.TransactionID))
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("UniqueMovieID",concat(df_streaming.SourceID, df_streaming.MovieID))
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("UniqueCustomerID", concat(df_streaming.SourceID, df_streaming.CustomerID))
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("StreamStart", to_timestamp(df_streaming.StreamStart))
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("StreamEnd", to_timestamp(df_streaming.StreamEnd))
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("CreatedDate", to_timestamp(df_streaming.CreatedDate))
df_streaming = df_streaming.withColumn("UpdatedDate", to_timestamp(df_streaming.UpdatedDate))

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from datetime import datetime
   
account_name = 'dlsmdw778t05dev'
container_name = 'dls' 
relative_path = 'silver/'

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

df_streaming = df_streaming.repartition(1)

dt = datetime.now()

filepath = f"{adls_path}streaming/" 

df_streaming.write.csv(f"{filepath}csv/", mode='overwrite', header = 'true') 
df_streaming.write.parquet(f"{filepath}parquet/", mode='overwrite') 
df_streaming.write.json(f"{filepath}json/", mode='overwrite')
